skills.name: BAT OF NAILS
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Remove All Beneficial Effects including Golden Effects, except Perfect Health, Shroud, and Soul Protect, if the target’s HP is less than 60%.

skills.name: DANGER ZONE
desc: • Grant Increased ATK and MAGIC to all allies for 2 turns.
• Inflict Time Bomb on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: ENVY
desc: • Heal allies based on the number of beneficial effects, including Golden Effects, on each enemy and steal one beneficial effect from a random enemy every turn..
